title: I need to buy RP to gift a skin for Christmas :(

replies.body:
I'm a bit late responding to this D: but hopefully you were still able to purchase some RP in time for Christmas.

If you're still having issues with purchasing RP, let me know what kind of issues you're seeing (error messages, etc.) and I'll try to troubleshoot from there.

In regards to all of that, I hope you still had a good Christmas!
When did this start, I'm trying to get RP too D:
